tool_description: Summarize articles & extract topics from them. Configure this API in [the Language Studio](studio.oneai.com/?pipeline=GzAO2u&utm_medium=summa_topics&utm_source=rapidapi)
name: Article Summary and Topics
title: Article Summary and Topics

api_list.name: Summary + Topics
api_list.description:
Send a POST request to this endpoint to summarize & extract topics from an article.
Enter text input as a JSON object with an `input` field of type `string`.
In the response, `output[0].text` contains the summary, and `output[0].labels` contains a list of topics.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-summary-and-topics.p.rapidapi.com/pipeline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-summary-and-topics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-summary-and-topics.p.rapidapi.com/pipeline"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
